data.name: Rogue
data.description:
Rogue

Units:
-30% buy cost
+200 Artillery attack range
-2 armor

Buildings:
+100 attack range

Upgrades:
+3Lv Unit Damage

Magic:
Blindness (30% miss for 15 sec)
Maddening Rage (+25% damage, -5 armor)
Shockwave (100 damage in a line)

Traits: Cheap units with significant battle experience. Trained to fight without any honour and show no mercy. Real soldiers of fortune, relying on acquiring high quality gear on the battlefield.

Difficulty: Skilled

auras.name: Camouflage Aura
auras.description:
Hides your buildings
(1500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Swiftness Aura
auras.description:
+30% unit move speed
(4500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Endurance Aura
auras.description:
+15% unit attack and move speed
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Ambush Tactics [Q]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Backstab

Reduces spell damage to Enforcer, Brigand, Rogue Wizard and Marauder by 15%. Your units become invisible. Unit Evasion is increased by 5%.

Type: Anti Magic Damage

bonuses.name: Alterac Vanguard [W]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Parry

Alterac Vanguard replaces Enforcer
Melee Unit
+8 damage
Abilities:
Flurry (Self Spell)
(+100% AS for 5 sec)
Cleaving Strike (Passive Skill)
(15% for 60 damage in 125 AoE)
Upgrades used:
Steel Blades
Leather Armor
Backstab
Rare Venom
Parry
Field Upgrade

Type: Early Push

units.name: Alterac Vanguard
units.description:
Melee Unit
Strong Vs Ranged Unit
Weak Vs Spellcaster

bonuses.name: Trickster [E]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Throwing Knives

Trickster replaces Brigand
Ranged Unit
-100 range
+20% attack rate
+4 armor
Abilities:
Disarm (Passive Skill)
(10% to disarm for 2 sec)
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)
Bear Trap (Summoning Spell)
(5 sec stun in 125 AoE)
(affects non-Hero units only)
Upgrades used:
Steel Blades
Leather Armor
Rare Venom
Parry
Throwing Knives
Field Upgrade

Type: Disruption

Alterac Arbalester replaces Brigand
Ranged Unit
-10% attack rate
+200 attack range
+4 damage
Abilities:
Bola Shot (Disable Spell)
(binds 1 unit for 15 sec)
(affects non-Hero units only)
Impaling Shot (Passive Skill)
(20% for 50 damage, 1 sec stun)
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)
Upgrades used:

Leather Armor

+1 level of Polymorph

Banished Sorcerer replaces Rogue Wizard
Spellcaster
+100 attack range
+4 damage
+50 MP
Abilities:
Abolish Magic (Disable Spell)
(dispels buff every 20/15/10/5 sec)
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)
Silence (Disable Spell)
(silences for 10/15/20/25 sec)
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)
Upgrades used:
Forbidden Arts (Upgrades Abilities)
Leather Armor
Polymorph
Field Upgrade

Type: Anti Magic

bonuses.name: Item Crafting [X]
bonuses.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.name: Item Crafting
spells.description:
Each time you summon a Hero (except for the first time) he will receive a random item. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell last item to free up inventory slots. Heroes get random item every 4 levels and whenever they kill another Hero.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

spells.description: Sell Lv1 item from Strength Hero.

bonuses.description:

spells.description:
Restores 100 HP over 30 sec.
(can affect mechanical units)
(can target your enemy as well)

bonuses.name: We hate Heroes! [V]
bonuses.description:
No, seriously, we do hate them!

spells.description:
Blasts any Hero.

spells.description:
Reduces enemy Hero damage by 20% and armor by 3.
(2000 range)

spells.name: We hate Heroes!
spells.description:
Barracks and Towers deal more damage to Heroes.

Type: Anti Hero

upgrades.description:

+10% damage reduction
+3 armor reduction
+1000 Aura range

spells.description:

spells.name: Mini Smite [W]
spells.description:
Blasts any Hero.

towerUpgrades.name: Backstab
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance for bonus damage
Affects: Enforcer and Marauder

Lv1: 9% to do 2.25x damage
Lv2: 18% to do 2.5x damage
Lv3: 27% to do 2.75x damage
Lv4: 36% to do 3x damage

towerUpgrades.name: Rare Venom
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage and slow for 15 sec
Affects: Enforcer and Brigand
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: 5 damage/sec, 5% slow
Lv2: 10 damage/sec, 10% slow
Lv3: 15 damage/sec, 15% slow
Lv4: 20 damage/sec, 20% slow

towerUpgrades.name: Throwing Knives
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: 2 knives every 10 sec
Affects: Brigand
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: 40 damage per knife
Lv2: 80 damage per knife
Lv3: 120 damage per knife
Lv4: 160 damage per knife

towerUpgrades.name: Parry
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance to block melee attack
Affects: Enforcer and Brigand

Lv1: 12% chance
Lv2: 24% chance
Lv3: 36% chance
Lv4: 48% chance

towerUpgrades.name: Commander Aura
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage to melee units
Affects: Marauder

Lv1: +10% damage in 300 AoE
Lv2: +20% damage in 350 AoE
Lv3: +30% damage in 400 AoE
Lv4: +40% damage in 450 AoE

Gives: hit points and damage
Affects: Marauder and Pegasus Rider

Lv1: +25 HP, +6/8 damage
Lv2: +50 HP, +12/16 damage
Lv3: +75 HP, +18/24 damage
Lv4: +100 HP, +24/32 damage

towerUpgrades.name: Shrapnel Rounds
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: chance for bonus damage
Affects: Mortar and Mortar Turret

Lv1: 15% to do 3x damage
Lv2: 30% to do 3x damage
Lv3: 45% to do 3x damage
Lv4: 60% to do 3x damage

towerUpgrades.name: Polymorph
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: disabling ability
Affects: Rogue Wizard
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Lv1: lasts 2 sec
Lv2: lasts 3 sec
Lv3: lasts 4 sec
Lv4: lasts 5 sec

towerUpgrades.name: Field Upgrade
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: upgrade after a kill
Affects: All non-Hero units
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: can get Lv1 items
Lv2: can get Lv2 items
Lv3: can get Lv3 items
Lv4: can get Lv4 items

t1spell.description:

Cooldown: 50 seconds.

t2spell.description:

heroes.name: Fallen Lord
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Tank

Can learn:
Racist Remark (Disable Spell)
8 sec taunt and +20 armor
(550-700 area of effect)
(affects non-Hero units only)

Battle Cry (Support Spell)
12-30% damage bonus
(350-500 area of effect)
(affects organic units only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Shockwave (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in a line
(700-1000 wave distance)

Defend (Passive Skill)
30-40% to block an attack

heroes.name: Syndicate Leader
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs Heroes
Weak Vs All Units, Buildings

Role: Fighter
(has Permanent Invisibility)

Can learn:
Smoke Bomb (Disable Spell)
30% slow for 20-40 sec
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Blinding Dust (Disable Spell)
60% miss chance for 6-12 sec
(affects organic units only)

Crucial Hit (Passive Skill)
15-27% for 3x damage, 1 sec stun
(affects organic units only)

Bribe (Disable Spell)
controls unit every 30-15 sec
(affects organic units only)
(affects non-Hero units only)

heroes.name: Jailor
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Ranged)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Disabler
(has Permanent Invisibility)

Can learn:
Smoke Bomb (Disable Spell)
30% slow for 20-40 sec
(doesn't affect Special unit)

TNT Stick (Damage Spell)
225-375 damage in an area
(200-350 area of effect)

Bounty List (Support Aura)
400-1000 extra gold for Hero kill

Rare Venom (Orb Effect)
20-50% to poison for 20 sec
(affects organic Heroes only)
(doesn't affect Special unit)

heroes.name: Siege Cannon
heroes.description:
Special Unit (Ranged/Mechanical)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Heroes

Role: Pusher

Can learn:
Mortar Barrage (Damage Spell)
325-475 damage in an area
(200-350 area of effect)

Smoke Bomb (Disable Spell)
30% slow for 20-40 sec
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Troop Transporter (Summoning Spell)
summons up to 6-10 random units

Mortar Guns (Passive Skill)
launches 1-7 missiles at units
